public final class GLRenderTexture extends GLTexture
OpenGL readback render target.

  • Method Details

    • getSampleCount

      public int getSampleCount()
      Description copied from interface: ISurface
      Returns the number of samples per pixel in color buffers (one if non-MSAA).
      Returns:
      the number of samples, greater than (multi-sampled) or equal to one

    • asRenderTarget

      @Nonnull public GLRenderTarget asRenderTarget()
      Description copied from interface: IGpuSurface
      If this object is framebuffer, returns this.

      If this object is texture, returns the associated framebuffer if renderable, otherwise null.

      Returns:
      raw ptr to the framebuffer set associated with the RT, or null if non-renderable

    • onRelease

      protected void onRelease()
      Description copied from class: GpuResource
      Subclass should override this method to free GPU resources in the backend API.
      Overrides:
      onRelease in class GLTexture

    • onDiscard

      protected void onDiscard()
      Description copied from class: GpuResource
      Subclass should override this method to invalidate any internal handles, etc. to backend API resources. This may be called when the underlying 3D context is no longer valid and so no backend API calls should be made.
      Overrides:
      onDiscard in class GLTexture

    • computeScratchKey

      protected GpuTexture.ScratchKey computeScratchKey()
      Description copied from class: GpuResource
      Called by the registerWithCache if the resource is available to be used as scratch. Resource subclasses should override this if the instances should be recycled as scratch resources and populate the scratchKey with the key. By default, resources are not recycled as scratch.
      Overrides:
      computeScratchKey in class GpuTexture

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class GLTexture
